Reviews.Title: All Good!!! and Great Camera.....
Reviews.Author: Kevin Scott Foster
Reviews.Content: Everything went smooth.....I'm thinking of buying a bigger lens for a better zoom! If your kids are on a football field and your on the side lines a bigger lens will really help...

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0 Megapixel CMOS (APS-C) sensor, DIGIC 5 Image Processor, ISO 100-12800; expandable to 25600 (H)
Hybrid CMOS AF and Multi Shot Noise Reduction
EOS Full HD Movie mode with Movie Servo AF for continuous focus tracking of moving subjects
Compatible with Canon EF and EF-S lenses (Optional EF Lens Adapter is required)
Canon Speedlite 90EX Flash
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS M Mirrorless Digital Camera with EF-M18-55mm IS STM Lens and 90EX Flash (Red)
